means: （希腊的名医）希波克拉底（约公元前460-约公元前370，古希腊医师，称医药之父）

sentence.Network_en: Hippocrates after curing many diseases himself fell sick and died.
sentence.Network_cn: 希波克拉底在治愈许多病人之后自己病死了.
但是, 希波克拉底,你要认真听一听.

sentence.Network_en: The Hippocratic oath was not written by Hippocrates.
sentence.Network_cn: 希波克拉底誓约不是由希波克拉底撰写的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Hippocrates is the medicine founder in Greek and West.希波克拉底是希腊甚至整个西方医学科学之父。
hippocrateaceae 翅子藤科, hippocrates 古希腊医师, hippocrates'b 绷带

means.word_mean: 1. medical practitioner who is regarded as the father of medicine; author of the Hippocratic Oath (circa 460-377 BC)
